00028 #ifndef __PatchMesh_H__
00029 #define __PatchMesh_H__

00031 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00032 #include "OgreMesh.h"
00033 #include "OgrePatchSurface.h"
00034 
00035 namespace Ogre {
00036 
00047     class _OgreExport PatchMesh : public Mesh
00048     {
00049     protected:
00051         PatchSurface mSurface;
00053         VertexDeclaration* mDeclaration;
00054     public:
00056         PatchMesh(ResourceManager* creator, const String& name, ResourceHandle handle,
00057             const String& group);
00058 
00060         void define(void* controlPointBuffer, 
00061             VertexDeclaration *declaration, size_t width, size_t height,
00062             size_t uMaxSubdivisionLevel = PatchSurface::AUTO_LEVEL, 
00063             size_t vMaxSubdivisionLevel = PatchSurface::AUTO_LEVEL,
00064             PatchSurface::VisibleSide visibleSide = PatchSurface::VS_FRONT,
00065             HardwareBuffer::Usage vbUsage = HardwareBuffer::HBU_STATIC_WRITE_ONLY, 
00066             HardwareBuffer::Usage ibUsage = HardwareBuffer::HBU_DYNAMIC_WRITE_ONLY,
00067             bool vbUseShadow = false, bool ibUseShadow = false);
00068 
00069         /* Sets the current subdivision level as a proportion of full detail.
00070         @param factor Subdivision factor as a value from 0 (control points only) to 1 (maximum
00071             subdivision). */
00072         void setSubdivision(Real factor);
00073     protected:
00075         void loadImpl(void);
00077         void prepareImpl(void) {}
00078 
00079     };
00086     class _OgreExport PatchMeshPtr : public SharedPtr<PatchMesh> 
00087     {
00088     public:
00089         PatchMeshPtr() : SharedPtr<PatchMesh>() {}
00090         explicit PatchMeshPtr(PatchMesh* rep) : SharedPtr<PatchMesh>(rep) {}
00091         PatchMeshPtr(const PatchMeshPtr& r) : SharedPtr<PatchMesh>(r) {} 
00092         PatchMeshPtr(const ResourcePtr& r) : SharedPtr<PatchMesh>()
00093         {
00094             // lock & copy other mutex pointer
00095             OGRE_MUTEX_CONDITIONAL(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00096             {
00097                 OGRE_LOCK_MUTEX(*r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00098                 OGRE_COPY_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00099                 pRep = static_cast<PatchMesh*>(r.getPointer());
00100                 pUseCount = r.useCountPointer();
00101                 if (pUseCount)
00102                 {
00103                     ++(*pUseCount);
00104                 }
00105             }
00106         }
00107 
00109         PatchMeshPtr& operator=(const ResourcePtr& r)
00110         {
00111             if (pRep == static_cast<PatchMesh*>(r.getPointer()))
00112                 return *this;
00113             release();
00114 
00115             OGRE_MUTEX_CONDITIONAL(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00116             {
00117                 // lock & copy other mutex pointer
00118                 OGRE_LOCK_MUTEX(*r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00119                 OGRE_COPY_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00120                 pRep = static_cast<PatchMesh*>(r.getPointer());
00121                 pUseCount = r.useCountPointer();
00122                 if (pUseCount)
00123                 {
00124                     ++(*pUseCount);
00125                 }
00126             }
00127             else
00128             {
00129                 // RHS must be a null pointer
00130                 assert(r.isNull() && "RHS must be null if it has no mutex!");
00131                 setNull();
00132             }
00133             return *this;
00134         }
00136         PatchMeshPtr& operator=(const MeshPtr& r)
00137         {
00138             if (pRep == static_cast<PatchMesh*>(r.getPointer()))
00139                 return *this;
00140             release();
00141             // lock & copy other mutex pointer
00142             OGRE_MUTEX_CONDITIONAL(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00143             {
00144                 OGRE_LOCK_MUTEX(*r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00145                 OGRE_COPY_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX(r.OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME)
00146                 pRep = static_cast<PatchMesh*>(r.getPointer());
00147                 pUseCount = r.useCountPointer();
00148                 if (pUseCount)
00149                 {
00150                     ++(*pUseCount);
00151                 }
00152             }
00153             return *this;
00154         }
00155     };
00159 }
